bean.name: HazelcastAggregationRepository
bean.title: Hazelcast Aggregation Repository
bean.description: Aggregation repository that uses Hazelcast Cache to store exchanges.

hazelcastInstance.description: To use an existing Hazelcast instance instead of local

persistenceMapName.label: advanced
persistenceMapName.description: Name of cache to use for completed exchanges

useRecovery.description: Whether or not recovery is enabled

recoveryInterval.description: Sets the interval between recovery scans

deadLetterUri.description: Sets an optional dead letter channel which exhausted recovered Exchange should be send to.

maximumRedeliveries.description: Sets an optional limit of the number of redelivery attempt of recovered Exchange should be attempted, before its exhausted. When this limit is hit, then the Exchange is moved to the dead letter channel.

allowSerializedHeaders.label: advanced
allowSerializedHeaders.description: Whether headers on the Exchange that are Java objects and Serializable should be included and saved to the repository
